Table of Contents

Interface IFeedRepository

Namespace
NeonSuit.RSSReader.Core.Interfaces.Repositories
Assembly
NeonSuit.RSSReader.Core.dll

Repository interface for managing Feed entities. Provides comprehensive feed operations with support for active/inactive filtering, health tracking, and optimized data retrieval.

public interface IFeedRepository : IRepository<Feed>
Inherited Members
IRepository<Feed>.GetAllAsync(CancellationToken)
IRepository<Feed>.GetWhereAsync(Expression<Func<Feed, bool>>, CancellationToken)
IRepository<Feed>.FirstOrDefaultAsync(Expression<Func<Feed, bool>>, CancellationToken)

IRepository<Feed>.CountAsync(CancellationToken)
IRepository<Feed>.CountWhereAsync(Expression<Func<Feed, bool>>, CancellationToken)
IRepository<Feed>.InsertAsync(Feed, CancellationToken)
IRepository<Feed>.UpdateAsync(Feed, CancellationToken)
IRepository<Feed>.DeleteAsync(Feed, CancellationToken)
IRepository<Feed>.DeleteByIdAsync(int, CancellationToken)
IRepository<Feed>.InsertOrUpdateAsync(Feed, CancellationToken)
IRepository<Feed>.InsertAllAsync(IEnumerable<Feed>, CancellationToken)
IRepository<Feed>.UpdateAllAsync(IEnumerable<Feed>, CancellationToken)
IRepository<Feed>.DeleteAllAsync(CancellationToken)

Remarks

This repository handles all feed-related data access including:

  • CRUD operations with active/inactive filtering
  • Health monitoring (failure counts, error tracking)
  • Synchronization state (last update, next schedule)
  • Category-based organization and grouping
  • Bulk operations for performance optimization

Performance optimizations:

  • All read methods use AsNoTracking() for memory efficiency
  • Bulk operations use ExecuteUpdateAsync/ExecuteDeleteAsync
  • Server-side filtering with Expression predicates
  • Proper cancellation token support for long operations

CountWhereAsync(Expression<Func<Feed, bool>>, bool, CancellationToken)

Counts feeds matching the specified predicate with server-side evaluation.

Task<int> CountWhereAsync(Expression<Func<Feed, bool>> predicate, bool includeInactive = false, CancellationToken cancellationToken = default)

Parameters

predicate Expression<Func<Feed, bool>>

Filter expression for server-side evaluation.

includeInactive bool

If true, includes inactive feeds in count. Default is false.

cancellationToken CancellationToken

Cancellation token.

Returns

Task<int>

Count of matching feeds.

cancellationToken CancellationToken

Cancellation token.

Returns

Task<Feed>
